titleStmt.title: Appeal from the Chancery of Ireland. Robert Mason, Gent. Appellant. Thomas Nugent, commonly called, Earl of Westmeath, Respondent. The Respondents case.
titleStmt.author: Westmeath, Thomas Nugent, Earl of, d. 1752.
Mason, Robert, Gent.

notesStmt.note: The words "Thomas Nugent, ... Respondent." are connected by a left bracket in the title.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
